summary: Geopolitical fracture as US pauses Ukraine aid, Gaza ceasefire collapses, and Southeast Asia suffers a major quake.

events.details: Blue Ghost Mission 1 becomes the first commercial lunar landing to operate flawlessly.
White House officially halts military aid to Ukraine after Oval Office dispute.
Sudan sues the UAE at the International Court of Justice for alleged complicity in genocide.
Center-right coalition secures narrow victory following government collapse.
Israel restarts bombardment citing stalled hostage return; ceasefire collapses.
DeepMind unveils foundation models for physical robots combining vision, language, and action planning.
Magnitude 7.7 quake in Myanmar and Thailand kills more than 5,400 and injures over 11,000.
Reports surface of a $100B Microsoftâ€“OpenAI data center dubbed 'Stargate'.
